essentially bringing your legacy applications as is to the cloud the second is reap lat form when you
take your legacy applications you bring them to the cloud but then you replace different parts of your application with
AWS managed services and you get the benefit of coming to the cloud when you
do that the third category is essentially taking your back-office applications and putting it with your
cloud environment and the fourth category is we architecture which means
building your applications natively on the cloud so let's go through each one
of these in the re host model this is essentially a lift and shift we have
tools to help you do this the AWS migration hub is one another is VMware
on AWS and the benefit of riho stting is that you get the quick win General
Electric is in the process of moving 9,000 applications to the cloud but they
